body_html:
I like the idea of Modules being thin wrappers around functions, but should it also be the case for the containers? I guess the serializer could take care of filtering the parameters from the rest?

Anyway I see your point. Maybe I was trying to do something too similar to what people usually do in theano. So in this particular case what you would do is create the container as a RNN cell instead of a RNN, and have another class calling the RNN cell and storing the intermediate hidden states, or something like that?
